title: ariinv
author: ariinv
content: We will have a trading campaign on probit global exchange!For those who are not aware of the trading campaign or are new in this business, The purpose of a trading campaign is to turn a small amount of money into a vast sum over a short period using high volatility market conditions. A trader must build a project plan based on intervals to accomplish a trading campaign. Follow the instruction mentioned on Probit global website, and we wish you an excellent profit in a short period!Happy Trading!

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: If you are part of probit, make an announcement thread on the Service Announcements (Altcoins) and post details about your trading campaign there.It's an ease for some members that you can see your thread that's always in the forum and haven't visited your exchange yet.On if you still haven't got your announcement thread here, you can post it there and have the details of your exchange.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: I advice against taking part in this campaing. If you can "turn a small amount of money into a vast sum over a short period using high volatility market conditions" it will be much better for you to do it on binance (reputable exchange with low fees, low spreads, insane liquidity) rather than on probit with fake volume, fake orders in orderbook, fake liquidity.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: Tytanowy Janusz on August 21, 2022, 08:43:41 AMI advice against taking part in this campaing. If you can "turn a small amount of money into a vast sum over a short period using high volatility market conditions" it will be much better for you to do it on binance (reputable exchange with low fees, low spreads, insane liquidity) rather than on probit with fake volume, fake orders in orderbook, fake liquidity.He looks like a complete probit shill and some weird token. Just check out his post history - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3205637;sa=showPostsI would definitely never trust any of them (probit and the token OP is trying to shill) even with a cent.

comments.author: doomloop
comments.body: Quote from: Tytanowy Janusz on August 21, 2022, 08:43:41 AMI advice against taking part in this campaing. If you can "turn a small amount of money into a vast sum over a short period using high volatility market conditions" it will be much better for you to do it on binance (reputable exchange with low fees, low spreads, insane liquidity) rather than on probit with fake volume, fake orders in orderbook, fake liquidity.Short term trade on a high volatile market sounds very risky but it's also very rewarding as they claim it. If you are an experienced short term trader, you are used already to the high volatility. You can always try this one and see if you can make better returns on here than in your normal trading sessions.You can't just say that a trader will do this on other exchangers such as binance because they don't have a similar campaign like this but this campaign might only exist at the moment on probit global. The fees on this exchange can be a little higher but all the expenses will be recovered soon once you successfully win their campaign.

comments.author: ultrloa
comments.body: Quote from: Tytanowy Janusz on August 21, 2022, 08:43:41 AMI advice against taking part in this campaing. If you can "turn a small amount of money into a vast sum over a short period using high volatility market conditions" it will be much better for you to do it on binance (reputable exchange with low fees, low spreads, insane liquidity) rather than on probit with fake volume, fake orders in orderbook, fake liquidity.Agree with this since how could we trust those exchange where doing questionable actions the same like that. And if I am the trader I will just go on much reputable one because for sure the profit we earn especially when it comes to huge volumes of winning we can get it without any problems. Even if they cast a contest like this with huge pot prize offered still this is not convincing factor for me to go and trade there.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Oh, you're even shilling for Profit exchange and I just responded to another thread of yours thinking I was advising a neutral user of that exchange to be careful using their services. If you want to shill for a project, come out in the open and own it with you full chest. Don't hide beneath a mask.You can open an announcement thread like jossiel advised... ðŸ‘‡Quote from: jossiel on August 20, 2022, 11:51:03 PMIf you are part of probit, make an announcement thread on the Service Announcements (Altcoins) and post details about your trading campaign there.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: ariinv on August 20, 2022, 12:05:23 PMFor those who are not aware of the trading campaign or are new in this business, The purpose of a trading campaign is to turn a small amount of money into a vast sum over a short period using high volatility market conditions. A trader must build a project plan based on intervals to accomplish a trading campaign. Follow the instruction mentioned on Probit global website, and we wish you an excellent profit in a short period!This does not sound official at all, and this is not a professional means of looking for a way of letting more people to know more about an exchange. Turning a small amount of money into a high reward in a short time seem not possible, how would that be possible? You should professionally create an ANN thread about this.Quote from: Tytanowy Janusz on August 21, 2022, 08:43:41 AMI advice against taking part in this campaing. If you can "turn a small amount of money into a vast sum over a short period using high volatility market conditions" it will be much better for you to do it on binance (reputable exchange with low fees, low spreads, insane liquidity) rather than on probit with fake volume, fake orders in orderbook, fake liquidity.Even how is this possible on Binance? I only use Binance and OKX for trading, but I have not done anything like trading campaign of turn small amount to high reward before. Although there are many promotional offers from Binance, but which I always do not look into, I just prefer to trade, but while reading the promotional offers (which some maybe can be called trading campaign), I just do not like the task given, nothing like money is involved from customers, just tasks would be given which can be related to trading, like customers should trade this so amount of money and be qualified to take share in 10000 BUSD reward.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: doomloop on August 23, 2022, 12:56:32 PMYou can't just say that a trader will do this on other exchangers such as binance because they don't have a similar campaign like this but this campaign might only exist at the moment on probit global. The fees on this exchange can be a little higher but all the expenses will be recovered soon once you successfully win their campaign.This only proves that you are not a daytrader/scalper. Fees, spreads, latency, liquidity is crucial for them. Pay 0.2% fee + 0.3-1% slippage for in and the same for out and your trade profit is gone. Many BTC trading pairs are free from fees on binance. Calculate exit scam risk while trading on unreputable exchange and this campaign is really not worth the try. No matter how much they pay.Quote from: doomloop on August 23, 2022, 12:56:32 PM will be recovered soon once you successfully win their campaign.Few will win, all will pay.

Just check out his post history - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3205637;sa=showPostsI would definitely never trust any of them (probit and the token OP is trying to shill) even with a cent.It's just a promotion to the probit exchange. Binance hadÂ  also tried doing the same since the time when they weren't this big yet. And Probit supports the shitcoin also. It'd be great if the exchange can really pull this off since they have been in the business for a while listing since ICO days but have not really make it big.
